text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The weather forecast says it's going<n>to rain tonight, so I
finish up my work<n>and try to get right home, but...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Behold! Even from this terrestrial<n>plane, I bring you into my
majestic<n>light!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I hear a familiar voice coming from<n>somewhere nearby.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You think you're the only<n>lightbringer? Then gaze upon my<n>
shining glory! 'Tis the luminance of<n>the one true Centurial
Overlord!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: T.M. Opera O is at the riverside in her<n>usual grandiosity.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Well, if it isn't you here, Trainer. I'm<n>sure you're not
surprised to see that<n>I'm having a battle of beauty with the<n>
evening star.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Beauty, after all, is like racing against<n>a fierce opponent; the
struggle for<n>victory serves to make it stronger.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I take time every day to find a worthy<n>foe to hone my skills
against.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Now, back to our battle, evening star!<n>Here I stand, so show
me your<n>greatest brilliance!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Opera O faces the sky, striking a<n>pose.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Twinkle.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...But the star seems to hide behind<n>the coming rain clouds.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Phew, that was a battle for the ages.<n>Trainer, send the
evening off with a<n>round of applause.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
It is, and with its end comes my<n>victory. You saw it yourself.
Before my<n>magnificent self, the star fled in<n>shame!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
This means my beauty now makes<n>even the stars blush in<n>
embarrassment. Who shall I<n>challenge next? The moon... No,
the<n>sun itself!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As it's going to rain soon, the moon<n>is too shy tonight for a
battle<n>unfortunately.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Alas! Is there no one formidable<n>enough to rival me?
Trainer, do you<n>know anyone worthy?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh, I understand it must be a mostdifficult question. Only one personcould ever stand as myequal—me.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
So be it. I will have to bear my<n>solitude and find comfort in
the cool<n>night breeze as I search for my next<n>rival.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Hm... I wonder if she feels lonely.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm her trainer—there must be<n>something I can do for her.
She says<n>only she can stand against herself,<n>so...
choice_data_list: You could... battle yourself, for real.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: What? You would have me fightme?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That might be the greatest thought in<n>your life! I, the shining
light, did not<n>know how truly bright I am!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: What a fantastic idea! That's exactly<n>what I'll do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, I end up being called to the<n>dance studio on my day
off...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha ha! Watch carefully,<n>Trainer. I shall defeat
any opponent<n>with ease, even myself.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You'll have a premium seat to<n>witness my spectacular
victory. Now<n>let the battle begin. First... a pose<n>showdown!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She suddenly starts a heated battle of<n>aesthetics with the
T.M. Opera O in the<n>mirror.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... How can this be? Ihad no idea an opponent of suchstrength and beauty existed.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
She matches my pace at every step,<n>with the exact same
timing. Even her<n>poses are the same as mine, but<n>how?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Answer me, mirror self!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
It could be that she's thinking the<n>same thing as I am. Have
it your way.<n>I never truly believed our struggle<n>would end
here anyway!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: On to the next challenge! That's<n>right—a staring contest!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Pft, hehe... Haaah ha ha ha!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Foiled once again! How can I keep<n>from smiling before such<n>
immeasurable beauty? I'm at my<n>wit's end!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Blasted fate. It's another draw...<n>You're good—I grant you
that—my<n>mirror world self!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But the prelude of your defeat draws<n>near! Our destinies will
be decided in<n>this final duel... Red light, green light!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: You don't know when I'll saaay... red<n>light!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Gah?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I'm overwhelmed. The glamour of<n>this Umamusume is too
much! Please,<n>I must know your name...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I mustn't! To be tagged means losing<n>the battle! But why
can't I stop myself<n>from reaching for her hand?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I've been bested, Trainer. My mirror<n>self had even me
bound by her spell.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, the insult... I curse her! I detest<n>how beautiful the mirror
me is! I've<n>never felt so strongly!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But you won't find me weeping over<n>it. You'll see. One day
I will triumph<n>over myself. For I shall be Over—

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ngah! The beauty—it burns!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, I was naive to underestimate<n>your true power, mirror
self. Truly,<n>striving to surpass you may lead to<n>my death...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's collapsed on the floor,<n>completely immobile. Being
defeated<n>by herself must've really vexed her.
choice_data_list: ...Come on, Opera. You can do it.
...Come on, Opera. You can do it.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You're right. "Defeat" isn't in my<n>vocabulary. I am
determined to seize<n>glory next time.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You know... You're rather something,<n>Trainer. My respect
for you has grown<n>immensely.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Because you continue to gaze at me<n>unblinkingly, my
blinding radiance be<n>damned.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
If that strength of mind isn't to be<n>respected, I don't know
what is.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And if I'm to defeat myself, I, too,<n>must acquire that iron will.
Yet...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Those looks are just too appealing...<n>O me in the mirror, you
are truly the<n>rival to end all rivals!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
T.M. Opera O may have met the<n>greatest opponent of her life
in that<n>mirror... Wait, what am I saying?
